name: @talismn/chaindata
description: A community controlled index of relay/parachain assets to suppliment on-chain data, allowing developers to easily leverage the latest parachain information when building within the polkadot ecosystem.
author: Talisman Devs <devs@talisman.community>

scripts.validate-schema-chains: bun run ajv --spec=draft2020 -s schemas/json/chaindata.json -d chaindata.json -d testnets-chaindata.json
scripts.validate-schema: bun run validate-schema-chains && bun run validate-schema-evm-networks && bun run validate-schema-tokens && bun run validate-schema-tokens-buyable
scripts.validate: bun run validate-json && bun run validate-schema
scripts.update: bun run update-pjs && bun run import-pjs-config
